observations.message: Autonomous mode is active: review gates are bypassed and blocked/failed tasks follow retry-with-cooldown before final close.
Blog autopilot is active: non-autonomous tasks are prioritized first; autonomous blog queue is maintained with ~5 min break, base target 48/day, catch-up on, queue depth up to 8.
Blog publish automation is active: completed blog deliverables are converted to post payloads and pushed via publish_pipeline.
Queue has 50 task(s). OpenClaw will continue dispatching sequentially while idle.
'Tasks due from you' has 4 item(s): failed=4.

execution.global_wip_note: OpenClaw queue remains WIP=1 at orchestrator level.

agents.goal: Identify high-upside topics tied to L&D, gamification, data, LXD, and AI.
agents.output: Prioritized topic slate with thesis, audience intent, and ranking opportunity.

agents.goal: Map keyword clusters, search intent, and competitor coverage gaps.
agents.output: Primary keyword, supporting entities, SERP gap notes, and internal-link targets.

agents.goal: Convert strategy into a clear brief and outline with unique angle.
agents.output: Approved brief with section plan, CTA, and evidence requirements.

agents.goal: Gather credible source material and practical examples.
agents.output: Source-backed notes, claims table, and references for each major section.

agents.goal: Draft publishable post aligned with site voice and audience needs.
agents.output: Complete draft post in site format.

agents.goal: Keep title, framing, and examples aligned to practical reader intent.
agents.output: Clear title/excerpt/heading refinements and relevance checks.

agents.goal: Improve clarity, authority, and readability while preserving intent.
agents.output: Final edited copy with quality notes and resolved issues.

agents.goal: Define update cadence to protect rankings and freshness.
agents.output: Post-publication refresh plan with triggers and review cadence.

agents.goal: Publish and verify the post is live and correctly indexed.
agents.output: Publish proof with URL, timestamp, and pass/fail checklist.

insights: Organic Search share is only 6.1%, which suggests discoverability is still weak.
Traffic is concentrated: the top post contributes 86.5% of views within top content.
nextActions: Preserve the current narrative style and expand on topics that already show strong engagement.
Double down on your top-performing themes by publishing one follow-up post per week linked from high-traffic articles.
Add fresh internal links from /writing.html to newer posts so authority and traffic flow across the portfolio.
